name: Where Am I
description:
This game is about a dream that a person is having.

In that dream you are at some place, that some how looks like the office that you work. Then you will face the challenges of this place.

---

Controls: Keyboard Arrows

Current Version: 0.1v

---

This W.I.P. game was made by:

  • Kelvin F. (@k30v1n): As programmer, GameDesigner, 2D Artist
  • John McKinnon: As SFX/Music Designer
  • Bruno Rocha: As Game Designer

Bugs, problems or suggestions that you may have please feel free to open some Issue on this Where Am I - github.

Created and Published for My First Game Jam - Summer 2017
